overview: Cheryl is having a dinner party, and asks her gay brother, Jeffrey, to bartend. Thinking it's an open party, Jeffrey invites his boyfriend, Julian; Julian invites his ex-lover, Brett, and Brett invites his filmmaker buddy, Dan. Adding to the confusion are Cheryl*s cousins, Terry and Tracey from Wisconsin...and an elderly neighbor who inadvertently crashes the party....
title: As Long As It Takes
